expeditionofhumphryclinker_22_smollett_6.ground: I have known a negro driver, from Jamaica, pay over night, to the master of one of the rooms, sixty five guineas for tea and coffee to the company, and leave Bath next morning, in such obscurity, that not one of his guests had the slightest idea of his person, or even made the least inquiry about his name.

incidentsslavegirl_14_jacobs_64kb_26.mp3.ground: My child bore a strong resemblance to her father, and to the deceased Mrs. Sands, her grandmother.
